description: a classic and artsy 13 inch backpack perfect for school.
a mini version for whenever you want to take a journal with you.
the classic backpack that doubles as a shoulder bag.
a duo mini bag that can be used as a backpack and a shoulder bag.
a compact sized bag perfect for on to go minimal things.
rather have a lowkey subtle bag? it is perfect for weekdays like the name entails.
for the times whenever you don't feel like carrying a backpack.
a portable makeup or art supplies set whenever you are on the go.
a versatile bag to keep on you if you are doing quick errands.
small and portable to carry a minimal amount of writing utensils.
a lunchbox to keep your drinks cold and food warm when out and about.
a protective case to put in your backpack for photography and cameras.
a mini sized wallet to keep essential cards and coins.
for all the essentials you need to carry with you.
